waralath ganakadhikari aayathanayeshri lanka waralath ganakadhikari aayathanaya magin usas pela sisun sandaha pawathwu ‘sisunana’ adhyapanika wadamuluwakata sahabhagi wu sisu sisuwiyan pirisaki me.shri lanka waralath ganakadhikari aayathanaya magin sama wasarakama aposa usas pela wishaya dhara hatharen ma wadima lakunu labaganna sisun hathalis dena sandaha da aarthika washayen dushkaratha athi sisun sandaha da aposa usas pela wibhagaya sandaha ee samartha 3 k labaganna sisun sandaha da waralath ganakadhikarana patamala hadarima sandaha purna shishyathwa pirinamayi.diwayine siyaluma disthrikka aawaranaya wana paridi ‘sisu nana ha guru nana’ namin sisu daru dariyange saha guruwarunge danuma yawathkalina kirime aramunin jathika adhyapana aayathanaya ha adhyapana departhamenthuwa ha eekabaddhawa diwayina pura sammanthrana malawak da nokadawa pawathwagena yayi.purna washayen ganakadhikarana wibhaga awasan kala sisuwakuta ganakadhikarana kshethraye rakiya pamanak nowa wides ratawala wiwidha kshethrawala itha ihala watup ha waraprasada sahithawa rakiya labaganime ida prasthawa warthamana rakiya welenda pola thula pawathi.patamala sandaha bandawa ganim aarambha kara athi athara, shri lanka waralath ganakadhikari aayathanaya, no. 30, ee.
